short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extract and download page cover image.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Obtain the cover image of the page you are currently browsing and enable downloading it to the local computer.
When you see someone sharing a link on social media, and the link is displayed as a card, and you particularly like the image on the card, you can open the link in your browser and use the plugin to obtain and download that image.
